A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Left theatre so disappointed.  I'm a casual franchise fan and enjoyed The Force Awakens. Like the new characters but this film did zero to advance the plot or make me care about what happens next. Older characters were mishandled or discarded.  New characters had little or no growth. Pointless sub plot.  Cringeworthy humor.  Did not feel like a Star Wars movie to me.
